<p><b>Durango</b> is an <a href="/wiki/Unincorporated_area" title="Unincorporated area">unincorporated community</a> in western <a href="/wiki/Falls_County,_Texas" title="Falls County, Texas">Falls County</a>, <a href="/wiki/Texas" title="Texas">Texas</a>, <a href="/wiki/United_States" title="United States">United States</a>. It lies along Farm to Market Road 935.</p>
